page.title: 09Employment
page.content: As this is a time of economic depression there is much unemployment in the general area.Here it is less because the scattered homes house men and women who work locally.Others as with many on the housing estate travel to different places to perform a variety of tasks.Many are operatives,process workers,shop assistants and clerks in the various manufacturing and service industries in the area.Some are retired (usually over 65 years of age) some are unemployed unable to secure employment,andsome were made redundant from industries unable to compete in present day trading conditions.The present rate of unemployment in Wrexham Maelor Borough is 17% of the working population.
